name: Long Steel (itch)
description: LONG STEEL - Rise from the Ashes - 20 years after the defeat of the Shaper of Magic, Warlock, the island of Melas is in a time of peace. But when the dark cult known as the Wicken return to return Warlock from his ashes, you must spring into action to stop them before it is too late. - Travel through diverse landscapes - Fight your way through 9 dungeons - Meet over a hundred NPCS - Cook, Smith, and Alchemize equipment, weapons, potions and food - Complete lots of side quests - Traverse through mini dungeons - Level to 30, increasing your health, mana and stamina as you go - Find upgrades to make you stronger and more durable - Lots of hidden secrets and easter eggs! - And more!
